import parseUnits
nodes.docs:
Multiplies a string representation of a number by a given exponent of base 10 (10exponent).

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/utilities/parseUnits

nodes.text:
function useCancelSync<Config, unknown>(parameters?: Hooks.dex.useCancelSync.Parameters<Config, unknown> | undefined): Hooks.dex.useCancelSync.ReturnType<Config, unknown>
namespace useCancelSync
nodes.docs:
Hook for canceling an order from the orderbook.

Note: This is a synchronous hook that waits for the transaction
to be included on a block before returning a response.

nodes.text:
namespace approve
function approve<chain extends Chain | undefined, account extends Account | undefined>(client: Client<Transport, chain, account>, parameters: Actions.token.approve.Parameters<chain, account>): Promise<Actions.token.approve.ReturnValue>
nodes.docs: Approves a spender to transfer TIP20 tokens on behalf of the caller.
tags:
```ts
import { createClient, http } from 'viem'
import { tempo } from 'viem/chains'
import { Actions } from 'viem/tempo'
import { privateKeyToAccount } from 'viem/accounts'

const client = createClient({
  account: privateKeyToAccount('0x...'),
  chain: tempo({ feeToken: '0x20c0000000000000000000000000000000000001' })
  transport: http(),
})

const result = await Actions.token.approve(client, {
  spender: '0x...',
  amount: 100n,
})
```

nodes.docs:
Defines a call to the `approve` function.

Can be passed as a parameter to:
- [`estimateContractGas`](https://viem.sh/docs/contract/estimateContractGas): estimate the gas cost of the call
- [`simulateContract`](https://viem.sh/docs/contract/simulateContract): simulate the call
- [`sendCalls`](https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/sendCalls): send multiple calls
Address of the spender.
Amount of tokens to approve.

nodes.text:
(alias) parseUnits(value: string, decimals: number): bigint
import parseUnits
nodes.docs:
Multiplies a string representation of a number by a given exponent of base 10 (10exponent).

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/utilities/parseUnits
Address or ID of the TIP20 token.

nodes.text:
namespace place
function place<chain extends Chain | undefined, account extends Account | undefined>(client: Client<Transport, chain, account>, parameters: Actions.dex.place.Parameters<chain, account>): Promise<Actions.dex.place.ReturnValue>
nodes.docs: Places a limit order on the orderbook.
tags:
```ts
import { createClient, http, parseUnits } from 'viem'
import { privateKeyToAccount } from 'viem/accounts'
import { tempo } from 'viem/chains'
import { Actions, Tick } from 'viem/tempo'

const client = createClient({
  account: privateKeyToAccount('0x...'),
  chain: tempo({ feeToken: '0x20c0000000000000000000000000000000000001' })
  transport: http(),
})

const hash = await Actions.dex.place(client, {
  amount: parseUnits('100', 6),
  tick: Tick.fromPrice('0.99'),
  token: '0x20c...11',
  type: 'buy',
})
```

nodes.docs:
Defines a call to the `place` function.

Can be passed as a parameter to:
- [`estimateContractGas`](https://viem.sh/docs/contract/estimateContractGas): estimate the gas cost of the call
- [`simulateContract`](https://viem.sh/docs/contract/simulateContract): simulate the call
- [`sendCalls`](https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/sendCalls): send multiple calls
Address of the base token.
Amount of tokens to place in the order.

nodes.text:
(alias) parseUnits(value: string, decimals: number): bigint
import parseUnits
nodes.docs:
Multiplies a string representation of a number by a given exponent of base 10 (10exponent).

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/utilities/parseUnits
Order type - 'buy' to buy the token, 'sell' to sell it.
Price tick for the order.

nodes.text: var FormData: new (form?: HTMLFormElement, submitter?: HTMLElement | null) => FormData
nodes.docs:
The **`FormData`** interface provides a way to construct a set of key/value pairs representing form fields and their values, which can be sent using the Window/fetch, XMLHttpRequest.send() or navigator.sendBeacon() methods.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/FormData)

The **`HTMLFormElement`** interface represents a form element in the DOM.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLFormElement)

nodes.text:
var BigInt: BigIntConstructor
(value: bigint | boolean | number | string) => bigint

nodes.docs:
The **`get()`** method of the FormData interface returns the first value associated with a given key from within a `FormData` object.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/FormData/get)
The mutation function you can call with variables to trigger the mutation and optionally hooks on additional callback options.
tags: variables - The variables object to pass to the `mutationFn`.
options.onSuccess - This function will fire when the mutation is successful and will be passed the mutation's result.
options.onError - This function will fire if the mutation encounters an error and will be passed the error.
options.onSettled - This function will fire when the mutation is either successfully fetched or encounters an error and be passed either the data or error.

- If you make multiple requests, `onSuccess` will fire only after the latest call you've made.
- All the callback functions (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) are void functions, and the returned value will be ignored.

nodes.docs:
A boolean variable derived from `status`.
- `true` if the mutation is currently executing.
